To Whom it May Concern at Tumblr:

As per your request, I have formatted my DMCA complaint dated, to conform
with your submission guidelines.

1. This complaint covers the unauthorized use of the film footage and film
clips from our movies on your website in violation of DMCA the films are
"FORGET ABOUT IT" and "CHAINED HEAT 2"

2. The following links are in violation of DMCA.  We are the sole owners
of the film "FORGET ABOUT IT" and " CHAINED HEAT 2" I am hereby authorized
to enforce this copyright.

http://www.google.com/imgres?q=kimberley+kates&hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&biw=1067&bih=614&tbm=isch&prmd=imvnso&tbnid=d54NzW65_63qRM:&imgrefurl=http://sharetv.org/person/kimberley_kates&docid=NmGGdhgauBURGM&imgurl=http://sharetv.org/images/person/kimberley_kates.jpg&w=195&h=260&ei=kcULT_LmMY7-iQLR_OX0Aw&zoom=1&iact=hc&vpx=264&vpy=141&dur=4167&hovh=208&hovw=156&tx=107&ty=127&sig=106948366587826810390&page=1&tbnh=120&tbnw=111&start=0&ndsp=22&ved=1t:429,r:1,s:0

http://www.google.com/imgres?q=kimberley+kates&hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&biw=1067&bih=614&tbm=isch&prmd=imvnso&tbnid=4i5W40AHgQZ0zM:&imgrefurl=http://urdx.com/index.php%3Ftopic%3D317910.0&docid=KWwNv5p-ZzLYnM&imgurl=http://img251.imagevenue.com/loc462/th_18240_Kimberley_Kates__Lucie_Benes_Chained_Heat_2_123_462lo.jpg&w=300&h=217&ei=kcULT_LmMY7-iQLR_OX0Aw&zoom=1&iact=hc&vpx=593&vpy=272&dur=411&hovh=173&hovw=240&tx=120&ty=188&sig=
106948366587826810390&page=5&tbnh=111&tbnw=149&start=81&ndsp=22&ved=1t:429,r:19,s:81

http://www.google.com/imgres?q=kimberley+kates&hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&biw=1067&bih=614&tbm=isch&prmd=imvnso&tbnid=HDlxdKLJ394RWM:&imgrefurl=http://www.tvtotty.net/tottyvids18-08/id61.htm&docid=Duzg0klKWNv-rM&imgurl=http://www.tvtotty.net/tottyvids18-08/516bed20.jpg&w=446&h=210&ei=kcULT_LmMY7-iQLR_OX0Aw&zoom=1&iact=hc&vpx=179&vpy=296&dur=24&hovh=154&hovw=327&tx=171&ty=74&sig=106948366587826810390&page=8&tbnh=75&tbnw=160&start=140&ndsp=18&ved=1t:429,r:13,s:140

http://www.google.com/imgres?q=kimberley+kates&hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&biw=1067&bih=614&tbm=isch&prmd=imvnso&tbnid=KstuSPvDz29xLM:&imgrefurl=http://www.celebritymoviezone.com/kimberley-kates-sex-movie/&docid=RAS7ePzbo3qh3M&imgurl=http://www.celebritymoviezone.com/kimberley-kates-sex-movie/2.jpg&w=320&h=240&ei=kcULT_LmMY7-iQLR_OX0Aw&zoom=1&iact=hc&vpx=379&vpy=186&dur=637&hovh=192&hovw=256&tx=158&ty=94&sig=106948366587826810390&page=11&tbnh=119&tbnw=158&start=195&ndsp=21&ved=1t:429,r:9,s:195

http://www.google.com/imgres?q=kimberley+kates&start=515&hl=en&safe=off&sa=X&biw=1067&bih=614&tbm=isch&prmd=imvnso&tbnid=Do-pssCqbZwLCM:&imgrefurl=http://www.meemm.com/picture/240px-Lucie_Benesova_Kimberley_Kates_bh_01.jpg.html&docid=1YqUkheUgFnX1M&imgurl=http://www.meemm.com/images/240px-Lucie_Benesova_Kimberley_Kates_bh_01.jpg&w=240&h=170&ei=HscLT9rNH6KoiQKv_OT9Aw&zoom=1&chk=sbg&iact=hc&vpx=439&vpy=230&dur=1486&hovh=136&hovw=192&tx=90&ty=74&sig=106948366587826810390&page=26&tbnh=117&tbnw=146&ndsp=21&ved=1t:429,r:3,s:515
  

3. You may contact me directly at legal@bigscreenent.com.

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials and
film described above on the allegedly infringing webpage(s) is not
authorized by us, the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code
Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is
accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."


Thank you for your prompt attention to the removal of these images.

Regards,


Randy Roberts
Legal Dept.
Big Screen Entertainment Group
Paramount Studios
5555 Melrose Avenue
Wallis Bldg. #222
Los Angeles, CA 90038
323.654.3400 - tel
323.654.3401 - fax
www.bigscreenent.com
